section.name: Compression and Decompression
section.p: This is a collection of compression and decompression routines for standard seismic data formats in Java. The goal is to support all the formats available within seed, but submissions from the broader community are needed to accomplish this.
The current supported formats are Steim1 (compression and decompression), steim2 (decompression only) and the simple float, int, double and short types.
A jar can be downloaded here. The source code can be browsed here and downloaded here.
